overview_of_class: The course introduces teaching and learning strategies that aid course participants in becoming effective educators in the secondary school setting. Emphasizing current research, the course is a comprehensive study of teaching methods in the social sciences: economics, history, political science, and sociology/anthropology. Lesson and unit planning and assessment of student learning are elements of the seminar.
name: Methods & Techniques: Social Science
title: SESP MS_ED 459-0-20 Methods & Techniques: Social Science
